creator: embpic
title: How to Build Solar Based Power Bank Using Dead Mobile's Battery
description: This project details how to build a solar-powered power bank using a dead mobile phone battery. A solar panel charges the battery, and the battery's power is then used to charge a mobile phone.
steps: Connect the 6V solar panel to the TP4056 charging module.  The solar panel will provide approximately 5V when exposed to sunlight, which will be used to charge the battery.

Connect the mobile phone battery to the TP4056 charging module. The TP4056 will charge the battery to 4.2V. A red light will indicate the charging status, and a green light will indicate that the battery is fully charged.
Connect the output pins of the TP4056 to the USB boost converter.
Connect the output of the USB boost converter to a USB connector. This connector will provide 5V output to charge a mobile phone.
